-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Client for analyze service
--   
@package analyze-client
@version 0.1.0.2

module Web.Analyze.Client

-- | wraps a request in code to log the requests and catch and report all
--   errors.
wrap :: Handler b v a -> Manager -> ByteString -> Handler b v a -> Handler b v a

-- | like wrap, but also takes a handler that produces a user id if
--   available
wrap' :: Handler b v (Maybe ByteString) -> Handler b v a -> Manager -> ByteString -> Handler b v a -> Handler b v a
